unnormalised: ## Home Loan Bonanza: Diwali Just Got Brighter!
normalised: ## Home Loan Bonanza: Diwali Just Got Brighter!

unnormalised: Thinking of finally ditching that rented Gurgaon apartment and owning a piece of the pie? Good news! Banks are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes just in time for Diwali.
normalised: Thinking of finally ditching that rented Gurgaon apartment and owning a piece of the pie? Good news! Banks are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes just in time for Diwali.

unnormalised: HDFC is offering rates starting at a very tempting 8.5% for loans up to Rs. 50 Lakhs. Axis Bank is hot on their heels with a special pre-Diwali offer valid till Oct 25th. Talk about a race!
normalised: H D F C is offering rates starting at a very tempting eight point five percent for loans up to rupee fifty lakh. Axis Bank is hot on their heels with a special pre-Diwali offer valid till October twenty fifth. Talk about a race!

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! These aren't your grandpa's loans. We're talking flexible repayment options, lower processing fees (think saving a few thousand Rupees!) and even some cashback offers.
normalised: But wait, there's more! These aren't your grandpa's loans. We're talking flexible repayment options, lower processing fees (think saving a few thousand rupees!) and even some cashback offers.

unnormalised: Imagine celebrating next Diwali in your own home, maybe even making some bomb biryani in your own kitchen!
normalised: Imagine celebrating next Diwali in your own home, maybe even making some bomb biryani in your own kitchen!

unnormalised: Remember to do your homework, folks. Compare rates, check those hidden charges, and don’t get swayed by the shiny ads. Talk to multiple banks.
normalised: Remember to do your homework, folks. Compare rates, check those hidden charges, and don’t get swayed by the shiny ads. Talk to multiple banks.

unnormalised: Think of it like picking the perfect mithai for Diwali – you want the best deal, right? And always, ALWAYS read the fine print.
normalised: Think of it like picking the perfect mithai for Diwali – you want the best deal, right? And always, ALWAYS read the fine print.

unnormalised: So, this Diwali, maybe instead of just buying gold, invest in something even better – a home. Happy hunting!
normalised: So, this Diwali, maybe instead of just buying gold, invest in something even better – a home. Happy hunting!
